description:
Gonzalo Quiroga
--------------------------------------------
Universidad Nacional de Córdoba
--------------------------------------------
Social Networks:

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/gonzalo-quiroga-3bb44ab4/
Google Academic: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=5-1z3dYAAAAJ&hl=es
--------------------------------------------
Introducing IGNIS, a new technical and symbolic computing Software for science and educational purposes.
--------------------------------------------

IGNIS is a new cross-platform desktop software designed to provide an intuitive tool for symbolic computing. The software is based on several python libraries which are integrated in a modern user interface development in C++. IGNIS can be used for scientific, engineering, and student of all levels.

title: Interview Jorge Vergara - CTO at IBM Colombia - PyCon Colombia 2019
description:
Jorge Vergara
--------------------------------------------
CTO at IBM Colombia
--------------------------------------------
Social Networks IBM:

https://twitter.com/ibmcolombia
https://www.facebook.com/IBMSudamerica/
https://www.linkedin.com/company/ibm/
https://www.youtube.com/ibm

--------------------------------------------

About IBM Colombia

IBM arrived in Colombia in 1937 under the name of "Watson Business Machines Co. Of Colombia". Three years later, it began its expansion in the country, with the opening of the branches of Medellín in 1940, Barranquilla in 1947 and Cali in 1949. By 1953 the company changed its name to IBM Colombia S.A. Since then, IBM has been committed to the growth of Colombia contributing to the competitiveness of companies and making available to the country the experience, knowledge and technology to contribute to the solution of present and future challenges.
--------------------------------------------------
